me.gabeg.sicksends

Class SsProblemAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<SsProblemViewHolder>
      • me.gabeg.sicksends.SsProblemAdapter<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SsBoulderAdapter, SsSportAdapter, SsTopRopeAdapter, SsTradAdapter

    public class SsProblemAdapter<T>
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<SsProblemViewHolder>
    Card adapter where the cards contain information on a climbing problem.
